thread.section_title: Songfinch Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Songfinch | songfinch.com
thread.title: Jenny

author: Jenny
title: Jenny
text:
I purchased a song for my grandmother's birthday this past summer. Working with Rob and the Songfinch team was nothing short of an amazing experience. We gave them oodles of information about her life and they were able to piece together such an amazing story coupled with a beautiful melody.
Creating this song for her has turned into a memorable anthem for her life, and when the song started playing in front of our 25+ family members, there were laughs, smiles, tears and more smiles! Songfinch gave our family a memorable gift that no one will ever forget. This was such a perfect gift and I cannot wait to utilize them again for weddings, graduations and anniversaries. Thank you Songfinch!
